TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBinder extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对应用程序快速开发 (RAD) 设计器的支持以生成和分析数据绑定表达式语法。

span.span: Provides support for rapid application development (RAD) designers to generate and parse data-binding expression syntax.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在 ASP.NET 网页中的数据绑定语法中使用此类的重载静态 方法。You can use the overloaded static method of this class in data-binding syntax in an ASP.NET Web page. 与标准数据绑定相比，这提供了更简单的语法。This provides an easier syntax to work with than standard data binding. 不过，由于 `DataBinder.Eval` 提供自动类型转换，因此可能会导致性能下降。However, because `DataBinder.Eval` provides automatic type conversion, it can result in slower performance. 有关 ASP.NET 数据绑定、表达式和语法的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100))和[数据绑定表达式概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100))。For more information about ASP.NET data binding, expressions, and syntax, see [Binding to Databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100)) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100)). 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以使用模型绑定来简化某些在早期版本中通过数据绑定执行的任务。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data). ## Examples 下面的示例使用静态 方法，通过 `Product` 对象的 填充 控件的字段。The following example uses the static method to populate the fields of a control using an of `Product` objects. 可以采用相同的语法应用 方法，但该方法不会快速执行。The method could be applied with the same syntax, but it would not perform as quickly. 此示例使用自定义 `Product` 类，该类公开字符串 `Model` 属性和数值 `UnitPrice` 属性。This example uses a custom `Product` class which exposes a string `Model` property and a numeric `UnitPrice` property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是自定义 `Product` 类。The following code is the custom `Product` class. 此代码应包含在 App_Code 目录的单独类文件中，如 Product.cs 或 Product .vb。This code should be included in a separate class file in the App_Code directory, such as Product.cs or Product.vb. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/CS/App_Code/Product.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/VB/App_Code/Product.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在运行时是否启用了数据缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data caching is enabled at run time.

value.span: 如果为 类启用了缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if caching is enabled for the class; otherwise, .

summary.span: 在运行时使用反射来分析和计算对象的数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Uses reflection to parse and evaluate a data-binding expression against an object at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以使用模型绑定来简化某些在早期版本中通过数据绑定执行的任务。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Eval (object container, string expression);
.method public static hidebysig object Eval(object container, string expression) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, expression As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ expression);
static member Eval : obj * string -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: expression
param.span: 从 对象到要放置在绑定控件属性中的公共属性值的导航路径。

span.span: The navigation path from the object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property.

param.span: 此路径必须是以点分隔的属性或字段名称字符串，如 C# 中的 Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price 或 Visual Basic 中的 Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price。

span.span: This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.

summary.span: 在运行时计算数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Evaluates data-binding expressions at run time.

returns.span: 实例，它是数据绑定表达式的计算结果。

span.span: An instance that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `expression` 参数的值的计算结果必须为公共属性。The value of the `expression` parameter must evaluate to a public property. 在快速应用程序开发（RAD）设计器（如 Visual Studio）中创建数据绑定时，将自动调用此方法。This method is automatically called when you create data bindings in a rapid application development (RAD) designer such as Visual Studio. 还可以通过声明方式使用它来简化到文本字符串的转换。You can also use it declaratively to simplify casting to a text string. 为此，请使用 `<%# %>` expression 语法，如标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定中所使用的那样。To do so, you use the `<%# %>` expression syntax, as used in standard ASP.NET data binding. 在将数据绑定到模板列表中的控件时，此方法特别有用。This method is particularly useful when binding data to controls that are in a templated list. > [!NOTE] > 由于此方法使用反射在运行时执行后期绑定计算，因此与标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法相比，它可能会导致性能明显降低。Because this method performs late-bound evaluation, using reflection at run time, it can cause performance to noticeably slow compared to standard ASP.NET data-binding syntax. 对于任何列表 Web 控件（例如 、、或 ），应 `container` `Container.DataItem`。For any of the list Web controls, such as , , , or , `container` should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页面进行绑定，应 `Page``container`。If you are binding against the page, `container` should be `Page`. 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以使用模型绑定来简化某些在早期版本中通过数据绑定执行的任务。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `Eval` 方法将数据绑定到 控件。The following examples show how to use the `Eval` method to bind data to control. 它需要一个名为 "Product" 的数据类。It requires a data class named Product. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/product.vb#1)] 代码隐藏文件可加载测试数据，并将这些数据绑定到 控件。The code-behind file loads test data and binds that data to a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts.aspx.vb#2)] 在 控件的声明性语法中，对 `container` 参数使用带有 `Container.DataItem` 的 方法。In the declarative syntax for the control, you use the method with `Container.DataItem` for the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts3.aspx#3)] 或者，你可以调用 `Eval` 函数，而不包括 `container` 参数。Or, you can call `Eval` function and not include the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts4.aspx#4)]

exception.span: 为 或修整后变成空字符串。

span.span: is or is an empty string after trimming.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Eval (object container, string expression, string format);
.method public static hidebysig string Eval(object container, string expression, string format) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, expression As String, format As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ expression, System::String ^ format);
static member Eval : obj * string * string -> string

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: expression
param.span: 从 对象到要放置在绑定控件属性中的公共属性值的导航路径。

span.span: The navigation path from the object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property.

param.span: 此路径必须是以点分隔的属性或字段名称字符串，如 C# 中的 Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price 或 Visual Basic 中的 Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price。

span.span: This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.

param.name: format
param.span: .NET Framework 格式字符串（如 使用的字符串），它将数据绑定表达式返回的 实例转换为 对象。

span.span: A .NET Framework format string (like those used by ) that converts the instance returned by the data-binding expression to a object.

summary.span: 在运行时计算数据绑定表达式，并将结果的格式设置为字符串。

span.span: Evaluates data-binding expressions at run time and formats the result as a string.

returns.span: 对象，它是计算数据绑定表达式和向字符串类型转换的结果。

span.span: A object that results from evaluating the data-binding expression and converting it to a string type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `expression` 的值的计算结果必须为公共属性。The value of `expression` must evaluate to a public property. 有关 .NET Framework 中的格式字符串的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about format strings in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 在快速应用程序开发（RAD）设计器（如 Visual Studio）中创建数据绑定时，将自动调用此方法。This method is automatically called when you create data bindings in a rapid application development (RAD) designer such as Visual Studio. 还可以通过声明方式使用它，将数据绑定表达式所生成的 转换为 。You can also use it declaratively to convert the resulting from the data-binding expression to a . 若要以声明方式使用方法，请使用 `<%# %>` 表达式语法，如标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定中所用。To use the method declaratively, use the `<%# %>` expression syntax, as used in standard ASP.NET data binding. 在将数据绑定到模板列表中的控件时，此方法特别有用。This method is particularly useful when binding data to controls that are in a templated list. > [!NOTE] > 由于此方法使用反射在运行时执行后期绑定计算，因此与标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法相比，它可能会导致性能明显降低。Because this method performs late-bound evaluation, using reflection at run time, it can cause performance to noticeably slow compared to standard ASP.NET data-binding syntax. 慎用此方法，特别是在不需要字符串格式设置时。Use this method judiciously, particularly when string formatting is not required. 对于任何列表 Web 控件（例如 、、或 ），应 `container` `Container.DataItem`。For any of the list Web controls, such as , , , or , `container` should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页面进行绑定，应 `Page``container`。If you are binding against the page, `container` should be `Page`. 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以使用模型绑定来简化某些在早期版本中通过数据绑定执行的任务。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `Eval` 方法将数据绑定到 控件。The following examples show how to use the `Eval` method to bind data to control. 它需要一个名为 "Product" 的数据类。It requires a data class named Product. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/product.vb#1)] 代码隐藏文件可加载测试数据，并将这些数据绑定到 控件。The code-behind file loads test data and binds that data to a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts.aspx.vb#2)] 在 控件的声明性语法中，对 `container` 参数使用带有 `Container.DataItem` 的 方法。In the declarative syntax for the control, you use the method with `Container.DataItem` for the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts3.aspx#3)] 或者，你可以调用 `Eval` 函数，而不包括 `container` 参数。Or, you can call `Eval` function and not include the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts4.aspx#4)]

span.span: Formatting Types in .NET

summary.span: 检索对象的已声明数据项。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetDataItem (object container);
.method public static hidebysig object GetDataItem(object container) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataItem (container As Object) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetDataItem(System::Object ^ container);
static member GetDataItem : obj -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

summary.span: 检索对象的已声明数据项。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item.

returns.span: 表示容器的已声明数据项的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the container's declared data item.

returns.span: 如果未找到数据项或者容器的计算结果为 ，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if no data item is found or if the container evaluates to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用 方法，并在返回结果时忽略其 `foundDataItem` 参数。This method calls the method, ignoring its `foundDataItem` parameter when returning the result. 对象的数据项通过以下两种方式之一进行标识。An object's data item is identified in one of two ways. 如果容器对象实现 接口，则 属性将标识该数据项，并返回其值。If the container object implements the interface, the property identifies the data item, and its value is returned. 否则，该方法将尝试解析并返回一个名为 "DataItem" 的容器属性。Otherwise, the method attempts to resolve and return a container property named "DataItem".

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetDataItem (object container, out bool foundDataItem);
.method public static hidebysig object GetDataItem(object container, [out] bool& foundDataItem) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataItem (container As Object, ByRef foundDataItem As Boolean) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetDataItem(System::Object ^ container, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % foundDataItem);
static member GetDataItem : obj * bool -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: foundDataItem
param.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否已成功解析并返回数据项。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the data item was successfully resolved and returned.

param.span: 此参数在传递时尚未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 检索对象的已声明数据项，以指示成功或失败。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item, indicating success or failure.

returns.span: 表示容器的已声明数据项的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the container's declared data item.

returns.span: 如果未找到数据项或者容器的计算结果为 ，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if no data item is found or if the container evaluates to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的数据项通过两种方式进行标识。An object's data item is identified two ways. 如果容器对象实现 接口，则 属性将标识该数据项，并返回。If the container object implements the interface, the property identifies the data item, and is returned. 否则，该方法将尝试解析并返回一个名为 "DataItem" 的容器属性。Otherwise, the method attempts to resolve and return a container property named "DataItem".

span.span: Retrieves the value of an indexed property.

param.name: container
param.span: 根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which is evaluated.

param.span: 此引用必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the specified language for the page.

param.name: expr
param.span: 从 对象到要放置在绑定控件属性中的公共属性值的导航路径。

span.span: The navigation path from the object to the public property value to place in the bound control property.

param.span: 此路径必须是以点分隔的属性或字段名称字符串，如 C# 中的 Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price 或 Visual Basic 中的 Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price。

span.span: This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.

summary.span: 检索指定的容器和导航路径的属性值。

span.span: Retrieves the value of a property of the specified container and navigation path.

returns.span: 由计算数据绑定表达式所得出的对象。

span.span: An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `expr` 的值的计算结果必须为公共属性。The value of `expr` must evaluate to a public property. 对于任何列表 Web 控件（例如 、、或 ），应 `container` `Container.DataItem`。For any of the list Web controls, such as , , , or , `container` should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页面进行绑定，应 `Page``container`。If you are binding against the page, `container` should be `Page`.

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此引用必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

param.span: 包含要检索的值的属性名称。

span.span: The name of the property that contains the value to retrieve.

returns.span: 指定的属性的值，格式由 指定。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将调用 方法，然后使用 方法格式化 `format` 参数中指定的结果。The method invokes the method, and then uses the method to format the result as specified in the `format` parameter. .NET Framework 格式字符串（如 使用的字符串）将数据绑定表达式返回的 实例转换为 对象。A .NET Framework format string (like those used by ) converts the instance returned by the data-binding expression to a object. 为 方法引发的异常也适用于 方法。Exceptions that are thrown for the method apply to the method as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用 方法来绑定到索引值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method declaratively to bind to an indexed value. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataBinder.Eval Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataBinder.Eval Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataBinder.Eval Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataBinder.Eval Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#2)]

span.span: Retrieves the value of a property.
